alert.note: Alert for Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 03 at 10:32PM MDT until July 04 at 2:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM MDT FOR SOUTHERN OGLALA LAKOTA COUNTY... At 1032 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles west of Lonesome Valley to 6 miles west of Manderson to 2 miles west of White Clay, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Manderson, Lonesome Valley, Wounded Knee, Wolf Creek Housing, Goose Neck Housing, Thunder Valley, Evergreen, Porcupine Butte Housing, Porcupine and Sharps Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
